scripts.copyassets: npm run copyassetsdev && npm run copyassetssrc && npm run copyassetsprod
scripts.start: npm run copyassets && NODE_ENV=development parcel src/index.html aubio.wasm --out-dir dev
scripts.build: npm run copyassets && parcel build src/index.html aubio.wasm --out-dir docs --public-url ./
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add docs && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git push origin main
